alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the sulfuric acid functional group, with the generic structure HOS(=O)(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Organic sulfuric acids

alternative_parents.description: Inorganic chemical compounds with one or more oxygen atoms combined with another element.
alternative_parents.name: Inorganic oxides

class.description: Inorganic non-metallic compounds containing an oxoanion.
class.name: Non-metal oxoanionic compounds

description: This compound belongs to the class of inorganic compounds known as non-metal sulfates. These are inorganic non-metallic compounds containing a sulfate as its largest oxoanion.

direct_parent.description: Inorganic non-metallic compoundscontaining a sulfate as its largest oxoanion.
direct_parent.name: Non-metal sulfates

kingdom.description: Compounds that do not contain a C atom. Exceptions are made for isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon trioxide, carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Inorganic compounds

subclass.description: Inorganic non-metallic compoundscontaining a sulfate as its largest oxoanion.
subclass.name: Non-metal sulfates

superclass.description: Inorganic compounds that contain only metal elements.
superclass.name: Homogeneous non-metal compounds
